sources.title: A SMALL TOWN IDOL (1921) - abridged with narration
sources.description: A SMALL TOWN IDOL (1921) Abridged with narration by Jim Backus; circa 1950's Ben Turpin, Dot Farley, James Finlayson, Marie Prevost, Charley Murray, Phyllis Haver, Louise Fazenda, Ramon Novarro, Andy Clyde, Billy Bevan, Mack Sennet Bathing Beauties

metadata.Plot: Sam, a young man in a small town, is accused of being a thief. Unable to prove his innocence--and not knowing that he's being framed by a local villain to keep him away from pretty young Mary, the town beauty whom the villain wants for himself--he leaves town and goes to Hollywood to become an actor. He eventually returns home to town as a star, but once again finds himself the victim of the town villain, who this time abducts sweet young Mary. Sam must use all his acting skills to track down the villain and save Mary.
metadata.Writer: John Grey, Raymond Griffith, Mack Sennett
metadata.Actors: Ben Turpin, James Finlayson, Phyllis Haver
